mapper.select: select seq, title, id, regdate from board where exist=1 order by seq desc
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(MAX(seq),0)+1 as seq from board
insert into board(seq, title, content, id) values(#{seq},#{title},#{content},#{id})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedate=now() where seq=#{seq}
mapper.delete: update board set exist = 0 where seq=#{seq}
